sqoop.arg: SELECT AcqCtxVarClassID,AcquisitionContextID,VariableTypeClassID,IsOS,IsOC, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcqCtxVarClass WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionGroupID,AcquisitionGroup,Description,AcquisitionGroupCode,LoginID,ModifiedDT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ActionPlanID,RfSpecialActionTypeID,ActionTypeID,ActionSubTypeID,ActionPlanCode,ActionName,Description,ActionPlanOrder,RfPriorityID,IsRetired,VariableTypeID,AttributeTypeID,IsCompulsory,SortOrder,IsOCApplicable,IsOSApplicable, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionPlan WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetCountTypeID,AssetCountType,Description, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetCountType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AttributeTypeGroupID,Name,Description,AttributeTypeGroupCode, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AttributeTypeGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT CauseActionID,MeasurementSetID,IsAttributes,IndividualDefectID,AttributeTypeID,Cause,Action,DT,VarChartOCID,RfIsOSID,VarMeasurementID,VariableTypeID,IsEdited,RevisionNo,ProductID,AcquisitionID,MachineStageID,RfAttributeClassID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,RfAcquisitionClassID,SPCChartComponentID,SPCRuleID,RfCauseActionStateID,TAGMSVALUE1,TAGMSTYPE1ID,CreateDT,AcknowledgeDT,CloseDT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CauseAction WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ConcernTypeID,ConcernType,Description,ConcernTypeCode,Format, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ConcernType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DefectCountPID,MeasurementSetPID,HeadNo,DefectCount,Ignored,AttributeTypeID,ProductID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.DefectCountP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT FaultStateID,FaultID,FromDT,ToDT,FaultStatusID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,OriginalLoginID,EditedFaultStateID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.FaultState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT InvIsolatedReasonID,PartTypeID,IsolatedReason,InvStateID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InvIsolatedReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LineSectionID,LineSection,Description,IsRetired, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineSection WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LKConcernActionID,ConcernID,ActionID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkConcernAction WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentAssetID,DocumentID,AssetID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentAsset WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkLineLineGroupID,LineGroupID,LineID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkLineLineGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkMPGMPID,MaintenanceProcedureGroupID,MaintenanceProcedureID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMPGMP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartID,LineSectionID,LkPartLineSectionID,TheoreticalCycleTime, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkPartLineSection WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkSRGSRID,ScrapReasonGroupID,ScrapReasonID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkSRGSR WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableTypeGroupID,VariableTypeID,LkVTVTGID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkVTVTG WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStageEventTypeID,MachineStageEventType,Description,MachineStageTypeID,MachineStageEventTypeCode,IsAlarm,AlarmText, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageEventType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceManHourPlannedID,MaintenanceProcedureID,PlannedManHours,PersonnelGroupID,SupplierID,SupplierCost, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceManHourPlanned WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceProcedureResultID,MaintenanceProcedureStepID,MaintenanceWorkID,Result,ResultPassFail,Comments,DT,CheckedByLoginID,MaintenanceProcedureStep,StepOrder,SubPartID,Component,RfMaintenanceCheckTypeID,RfSpecialActionTypeID,Test,USL,LSL,PersonnelGroupID,SupplierID,Nom,Units,DecPlaces, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedureResult WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenanceWorkStatusID,MaintenanceWorkStatus,Description,RfMaintenanceWorkStatusID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceWorkStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCClientID,OPCClient,ComputerID,ModifiedDT,LastUpdateDT, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCClient WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCItemHistoryID,OPCItemID,UpdatedDT,RawValue,Value,Quality,CommittedDT, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCItemHistory WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCTextID,OPCItemID,Description,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCText WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PLCID,PLC,Description, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PLC WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT RootCauseTypeID,RootCauseType,Description,RootCauseTypeCode, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.RootCauseType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SettingsPlantNameTemplatesID,CreateInvPackNoTemplate,CustomerUniqueKeyTemplate,InventoryPackNameTemplate,WONumberTemplate,ReceiveInvPackNoTemplate,BOMVariantTemplate, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SettingsPlantNameTemplates WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftTypeID,Name,Description,IsNonWorking, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartSetViewID,SPCChartSetView,Sequence,SPCChartSetID,RfChartSetViewTypeID,NoCols,NoRows,Caption,Tooltip,IsAggregated,RfCutByIDs,IsPanelled,ImageURI,GridImageRender,ParetoXAxis,ParetoStackBy,SPCChartSetViewStyleID,IsAutoFit,OverlayFlags, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartSetView WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCVarChartID,SPCRuleID,ProductID,AcquisitionID,MachineStageID,VariableTypeID,RfAttributeClassID,HeadNo,RfAcquisitionClassID,TrendStartMSID,TAGMSTYPE1ID,ATTRIBUTETYPEID,TAGMSVALUE1,CreateDT,LoginID,IsMsetInsert, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCVarChart WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagPartInstanceID,PartInstanceID,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagPartInstance WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT TagProfileID,TagTypeID,EntryOrder,CompulsoryConditions,IsDefaulted,IsEncrypted,TagListID,IsReadOnly,RptQueryID,TagTypeInTagProfileID,TagTreeID,RfTagDataSourceID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagTypeInTagProfile WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Tool_Custom WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolStateID,ToolID,FromDT,ToDT,RfToolStatusID,LoginID,Comments,OpenedDT,SavedDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT UnitCountTypeID,UnitCountType,Description,MachineStageTypeID,DefaultUnitID,IsQuantityIn,IsQuantityOut,IsMaintenanceCount,IsConvertableToBaseUnits,AssetCountTypeID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitCountType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableTypeGroupID,Name,Description,VariableTypeGroupCode,IsSmartGroup,SmartGroupPattern, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VariableTypeGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT WorkInstructionResultID,WorkInstructionStepID,OperationID,DT,Comments,LoginID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WorkInstructionResult WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStop.MachineStopID, MachineStop.MachineStopReasonID, MachineStop.FromDT, MachineStop.ToDT, MachineStop.MachineStageID, MachineStop.IsEdited, MachineStop.RevisionNo, MachineStop_.StopComments, MachineStop_.StartComments, MachineStop_.StartLoginID, MachineStop_.StopLoginID, MachineStop_.OpenedStopDT, MachineStop_.SavedStopDT, MachineStop_.OpenedStartDT, MachineStop_.SavedStartDT, MachineStop_.OriginalLoginID, MachineStop_.EditedMachineStopID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM MachineStop FULL JOIN MachineStop_ ON (MachineStop.MachineStopID = MachineStop_.MachineStopID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
